name: Azimuth (wanicdigipen)
description:
OVERVIEW:

As the player, you shoot asteroids and enemies while trying to level up your abilities.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Controls

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Fire Laser: Spacebar

Bomb: Left Shift

Objective

Collect materials and survive as long as possible to upgrade your ship

CREDITS:

Gryphon M. - Game Designer, Programmer

Owen W. - Music Lead, Programmer

Frank V. - Game Director. Programmer

Thomas A. - Tech Lead, Art Lead
